CEMENTOS.SN.summary: Cementos Bio Bio S.A. manufactures and sells cement in Chile and internationally. It provides clinker, pozzolana, gypsum, pozzolanic portland, and other cement; and concrete products for housing, buildings, pavement, infrastructure, and mining projects. The company also provides lime, limestones, agricultural, and road solutions; and logistics management and technical consulting services. The company was founded in 1957 and is based in Providencia, Chile.

MELON.SN.summary: Melon S.A. produces and sells cement, concrete, and aggregates in Chile. Its products are used in high-rise building, household, industrial, mining, port, and civil works. Melon S.A. also sells its products online through the melononline.cl portal. The company was formerly known as Empresas MelÃ³n S.A. and changed its name to Melon S.A. in August 2009. Melon S.A. was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Santiago, Chile.

The company offers inner liners, manhole covers, traditional and acoustic volcanoes, panels and laminates, perimeter walls, faÃ§ade finishing products, plates for wet areas, impact plates, and plates with built-in color, as well as plasters, powders, and putties; and volcanites for wet areas, fire, hanging heavy elements, high hardness/impacts, radiological protection, and thermal insulation. It also provides commercial and industrial building insulation products, such as insulation for boilers and ponds, pipes, and industrial sheds, as well as thermal insulation products; ducts for air conditioning, heating, and ventilation; residential thermal insulation products; and flooring solutions, as well as volcanites with straight and curved shapes, and decoration. In addition, the company offers volcan products for agricultural use; and volcan accessories. The company was founded in 1916 and is based in Santiago, Chile.
